recommended_exclusion_criteria: Concomitant use with other anticoagulants (except as specified in protocol for treatment switching)
Concomitant thienopyridine therapy (clopidogrel, prasugrel, or ticagrelor)
Concomitant use of strong inducers of both CYP3A4 and P-gp (e.g., rifampicin, phenytoin, carbamazepine, phenobarbital, St. John’s Wort) with apixaban
